name: UnitConversion
0:
”Alexa, open Unit Conversion”
”Alexa, ask Unit Conversion to Convert 1 pound to ounces.”
”Alexa, ask Unit Conversion to Convert 1 dot 5 miles to feet.”
skdetail:
This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: unit conversion
des:
Have you been looking for a skill that will convert a unit of measurement? Well, look no farther! 

With this skill you can easily convert units in distance, time, mass and area. The units can be converted easily between metric and imperial systems.
priv: The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
